channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.0-beta.2)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.0-beta.2)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.5.0-beta.2 - 2023-09-04 # Fixed # Animator Component Disappears #404 MeshFilter Component Disappears with MeshRenderer #405 1.5.0-beta.1 - 2023-09-04 # Changed # Improved ‘Remove Unused Objects’ #401 Remove Unused Objects now removes unnecessary Components & Bones! 1.4.2 - 2023-09-04 # Fixed # Components/GameObjects can falsely detected as always disabled / inactive.
